name: Omi Momi
description:
OMI MOMI is a simple yet challenging puzzle game.
It is the perfect blend of classic 8-bit and 16-bit mechanics, making it a must-play for gamers who appreciate a retro feel.

The gameplay mechanics are straightforward, but if you enjoy challenging your brain and stimulating your neurons,
this puzzle game is perfect for you.

So are you ready to embark on a puzzle adventure of your life and help Omi and Momi discover what's inside the black hole?

Game Features:
• 3 Unique worlds with distinct environments and puzzles to solve

• A total of 60 levels with varying degrees of difficulty

• Secret biomes to uncover for the most dedicated players

• Each character, from the protagonists to the subtle background elements, is lovingly hand-animated with pixel art

• Easy to pick up gameplay, but difficult to master, making you think a lot while playing Omi Momi

• Discover a detailed world with pixel art and collect as many gold coins as you can
